name: Remove language suggestion box from YouTube
description:
Removes the big, annoying and unnecessary language suggestion box from YouTube. Last update: November 2010.

Entfernt die große, nervige und unnötige Sprachempfehlungsbox von YouTube. Letztes Update: November 2010.

user.name: Janko Hoener
user.about: Creating a "style" every now and then to fix issues with certain websites. Please let me know if you notice any issues with my "styles" or if I can assist you in writing one. Thank you.
